channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Shark! Celebrity Infested Waters
channel.desc: Sir Lenny Henry, Lucy Punch, Helen George, Rachel Riley, Ade Adepitan, Dougie Poynter and Ross Noble embark on a dangerous journey to the Bahamas to swim with sharks. S1 Ep1.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: John and Lisa's Weekend Kitchen
channel.desc: Join John and Lisa as they make four mouth-watering dishes - including John's pink spaghetti and moreish fuss-free banana doughnuts - with only five main ingredients. S10 Ep3.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Flushed Away
channel.desc: Animated action-adventure film featuring the voices of Hugh Jackman and Kate Winslet, 2006. An uptown London rat gets flushed down a toilet and ends up in the sewers of the city.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Katie Piper's Weekend Escape
channel.desc: Katie is joined by Rob Rinder to try wheelchair basketball, Michael and Gen transform a supportive sister, and JJ Goodman serves up more delicious drinks. S1 Ep14.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world as well as the latest major sports results.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Love Your Weekend with Alan Titchmarsh
channel.desc: Joining Alan to provide the chat this time are Selina Scott, Pixie Lott and Tom Parker-Bowles, and we also meet some rare-breed Guernsey goats with a royal title.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Ninja Warrior UK
channel.desc: More 'Superhero' contestants try their luck against the toughest obstacle course on TV alongside celebrity contestants such as Dancing on Ice's Sylvain Longchambon. S5 Ep4.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Lunchtime News
channel.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Mrs Doubtfire
channel.desc: Memorable comedy film starring Robin Williams and Sally Field, 1993. An actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his kids after a bitter divorce.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Spy Who Loved Me
channel.desc: Bond film starring Roger Moore and Barbara Bach, 1977. 007 investigates when a British submarine that is holding nuclear warheads vanishes suddenly while on a routine patrol.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Chase Celebrity Special
channel.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as actress Sunetra Sarker, Olympic diving champion Matty Lee, film composer David Arnold and the legendary Basil Brush take on the challenge for charity. S12 Ep11.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Evening News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world as well as the latest major sports results.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Celebrity Catchphrase
channel.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts a celebrity special of the classic game show with Mark Bonnar, Alexandra Burke, and Claire Sweeney all trying to 'say what they see' in aid of charity.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Karen Pirie
channel.desc: Detective drama. When a body is discovered in a quarry, DI Karen Pirie and her team are tasked with reopening the case of the infamous 1984 kidnapping of an heiress and her son. S2 Ep1.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Breaking the Silence
channel.desc: Former MP Kate Kniveton gives a frank and full insight into her experience of being abused and shamed into silence over ten years by her husband Andrew Griffiths.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Assembly
channel.desc: Gary Lineker faces a grilling from a collective of autistic and learning-disabled interviewers where no question is off the table and no subject out of bounds.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Shop on TV
channel.desc: Teleshopping.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Motorsport UK
channel.desc: Richard John Neil presents action from Snetterton featuring racing from the Wera Tools F4 British Championship and The Vertu MINI CHALLENGE. S21 Ep9.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Unwind with ITV
channel.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Tour de France Highlights
channel.desc: Stage 15: Muret - Carcassonne: Gary Imlach presents highlights from Stage 15 of the 2025 Tour de France as the riders leave the Pyrenees with a 169-kilometre stage.

channel.title: Lingo
channel.desc: Battling it out are Sophia and her husband James from Surrey, Welsh couple Rhydian and Jamie, and junior doctor Becky and her mum Julie from Leeds. Hosted by Adil Ray.

channel.title: Emmerdale
channel.desc: Liam makes a discovery, Robert's suspicions are piqued, and Pollard tells Mack the truth.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Ryan worries about Debbie's behaviour at work, Dev absolves Aadi of any guilt for the robbery, Lou asks a massive favour of Sally, and Billy overhears Theo lying to an old friend.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Shark! Celebrity Infested Waters
channel.desc: The celebrities fend off circling reef sharks without the safety of a cage, Helen faces her fear of the sea, and Ade has an equipment failure while surrounded by sharks. S1 Ep2.
